title: 26 perch land for sale facing main road at Pannepitiya
details:
Dear Sir / Madam,

26 perch facing main road at Pannepitiya . Facing to 174 bus route

Square land with 30 feet road access. 60 feet road frand to the land

Commercial area. covered by parapet walls.

Price. 1.5 million perch. Negotiate

Please call for more details.

Regards
Dilan
